documents.document: @MattGault11 can't wait to check it out!
Just watched Trainspotting in preparation for the sequel this week. Forgot how harrowing Renton's rehab is. Astonishing scene.
This arrived today and it's an absolute romper. Big ups @youngmallgrab https://t.co/4lYi9IZptw
Wrote about Chelsea's next 5 days - Antonio Conte's chance to avenge twin defeats to Liverpool and Arsenal… https://t.co/1b9sz32mN3
Federer-Nadal plus the Williams sisters in Grand Slam finals and now Cena-Orton at Mania. Are we sure this is 2017 and not 2008?
Fuck off Reigns ffs
@gbacon85 it's not, but it would be worth it for the Rumble haha
The Royal Rumble over Wrestlemania every.single.time.
@gbacon85 oh, I've no problem with Cena. AJ Styles deserves more than a mid-card role at Mania though
AJ Styles is verging on being the best wrestler I've ever seen. Pity he'll be shoved near the bottom of the card at Mania. Punk was right.
AJ Styles' theme tune is a certified banger
Green Velvet's 'Answering Machine' is one of my favourite tunes ever and should be one of yours too. https://t.co/k92oD1GEGh
@stighefootball Ligue 1's been bags full of fun this year.
@thehuwdavies a Lannister always wins
After weeks of consistent form, the real Roma returns.
Your dad's favourite acid house band appearing at the football. https://t.co/yb0iWn8O8q
Barca having their usual Sunday stroll in La Liga anyway. Because difficult games are the exclusive trademark of the Premier League.
Federer, Nadal, this era. Take a bow. Have to pinch ourselves that we get to watch this era. #AustralianOpen
I'd happily watch Federer vs Nadal every day
If there was one sentence to describe the Federer-Nadal rivalry it would be 'Nadal forces the error from the racket of Federer'.
@IrishGolfDesk Federer-Nadal plus the Williams sisters in grand slam finals, just like 2008. Back @padraig_h for the Open, so.
@FussballMundial it's very saucy indeed man. Belongs to my cousin. Unearthed a few gems from his collection.
Got hold of this absolute gem of a record. The Green Velvet remix is so groovy. https://t.co/0yjadKeinD
I'm sure there's Arsenal fans somewhere explaining why they'd be top of the league as well as defending champions if Welbeck had stayed fit.
So far, Antonio Conte has an 80% win ratio at Chelsea.
Tony Pulis' grandchild not impressed with Gareth Southgate's offer of a handshake. https://t.co/Cw2aeWD8Dq
The Life of Lambert https://t.co/hQsdNlYkB5
Paolo Maldini is a freak of nature. Getting better looking with age. https://t.co/F3kDIQEZT7
@thehuwdavies well worth the 3 quid.
The film in question was Birdman. Shouts out to Edward Norton. Special shit from him.
@corlelas nah, I stress about very little. My Netflix subscription isn't one of them lol
Every time I'm just about to cancel my subscription, Netflix uploads a movie that sucks me back in - the bastards.
@CianByNature I think I've met one person who actively didn't like it & judged him. Told my uncle to watch but he couldn't understand it hah
@CianByNature my guess is yes. I've watched clips since and the dialogue is peerless
@CianByNature haven't watched it in 5 years. Will make time to either this year
@DrHahntastic @Not_Rob_Palmer @TheFinal_Third @concalcio Catania's ground?
Federer vs Nadal & Venus vs Serena in the Aussie Open finals. 2008 me assumed they'd be playing in charity matches. What a time to be alive.
@jonathanliew that makes me a heartless dick too
Recognise everyone wants a Federer-Nadal final, but I really, really, really want Grigor Dimitrov to win #AustralianOpen
Guns, fascism & a Scudetto: I wrote about Lazio's crazy 1970s team as part of @TheFinal_Third's #MonthofCalcio… https://t.co/o6jEAvGkHj
@Priya8Ramesh went straight to the video version of Nikes on Frank's website haha
This is pretty great. I now want to listen to Blonde again https://t.co/awdPI1TyY2
Wiley's new record is quality. So much great grime at the moment.
Got to admire Mourinho's creativity in finding ways not to conduct a proper post-match interview.
@kcbpf he still looks and dresses tops, so I'll give him a pass on the dad posts.
@waynefarry oh yeah man, absolutely. You could equally scrutinise both sides for it at this stage.
@waynefarry tbf, the same could equally be said for the regressives as well man.
@youngmallgrab happy #AustraliaDay m9 x
@GentlemanUltra Gerson, but then I'm biased.
The @GentlemanUltra's top 50 young players in Serie A is well worth checking out. Donnarumma +49 imo https://t.co/Pb1I9vFcfv
Happy #AustraliaDay. Any excuse to listen to Tame Impala, really. https://t.co/1r8X5skzQC
@corlelas yeah, that's probably fair enough
@TMortimerFtbl proper football man Tom
@TMortimerFtbl don't try and diminish anything Shane Long does, Mortimer
Shane Long sure loves that far post finish past German goalkeepers. https://t.co/iEKVyI0Kw6
This will be going on there as soon as it's on Spotify. Absolute shirt remover https://t.co/SRxG9CHvdl
@davidfield_ things fall apart is one of my favourite albums
Made this Spotify playlist of funky and groovy tunes a few months back. Y'all should listen. Swear it's good https://t.co/yNqXdPbjSj
They go again https://t.co/0lnthi4KbR
The League/CocaCola/Worthington/Carling/Capital One/EFL Cup is far superior to the FA Cup. Don't @ me
Shane Long just did another Germany!
@PhilippeAuclair the funny thing is, he'd have his say say in parliament, if he hadn't failed to get elected on 7 occasions.
@davidpreece12 not ideal bearing in mind your new career
@munnelly_ryan best not to dwell on it lol
Skins is 10 years old? I feel fucking ancient.

Why Jurgen Klopp needs to solve Liverpool's problem against direct football in order to make the next step… https://t.co/ZH8BDBnie5
@horan_james tbf, Leicester won by 11 last year, Chelsea 8 the year before that.
@robbro7 Congrats are in order Brown!
@joe_paras it's a contributing factor, sure. But it also shows that the other leagues are just as competitive imo
"The most competitive league in the world." https://t.co/XeRgsjoCX3
@Ankaman616 2004 is my favourite, I think
Arsenal are not worthy of Alexis Sanchez.
Granit Xhaka's role as a Charlie Adam style hatchet man is quite something.
Well, he may not have got his own goal, but Wes Morgan has his say on the game by bundling over Shane Long. The man is fantastic comic value
Offside preventing Wes Morgan from scoring the own goal of the season.
@youngmallgrab Big ups for one of the sickest gigs I've been at in a long time last night. You're a good one fam
@pauloworldwide @TheFinal_Third @acjimbo he worked Costello song titles into all of the scores. Genius

@thehuwdavies yeah, very true.
That's daylight robbery
Ah, that's horrible for Lloris. So often, he's the man who digs Spurs out of a hole.
That's the way to break a record.
Stoke beating Manchester United with a midfield of Charlie Adam & Glenn Whelan. And they say the PL isn't the greatest league in the world?
Well, I said Llorente might win Chelsea the league, just not in this way. https://t.co/PNRFOuk0Ja
@dublin_damo yeah, totally. Looks like his AFCON departure could cost them dearly
They still should win, but Liverpool are having a lot of games like this recently where they've struggling against deep lying defences.
@TheDaisyCutter1 out. This, after watching Messi, Suarez and Neymar. He had nothing better than that to write
@TheDaisyCutter1 my favourite JJ moment was after City were beaten by Barca two years ago and he wrote about players that City would clear..
@TheDaisyCutter1 what's he done this time?
@Seananigen so good, innit? Being in the studio with James Murphy really shows
On an excitement scale of 1 to 10 for @youngmallgrab in Dublin tomorrow night, I'm at an 11.
If you're living in Ireland, he's literally not your President, mate. #Inauguration https://t.co/Z7TGgPRxH2
@CianByNature so baffling.
@glennthefitz yeah, two of my mates missed out through laziness - and I warned them as well. Sympathy for those who got messed about though.
@glennthefitz *got a ticket btw* no regretz
@glennthefitz "Run the who? Are they one of them college American football teams?"
